title: Guy Mannering, or, The astrologer /
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: formed a superb and uniform Place, extending  from the front of the Lucken- booths to the head of the Canongate, and corresponding in breadth and length to the uncommon height of the buildings on either side.

title: Memoirs of the life of Sir Walter Scott,
author: Lockhart, J. G.
snippet: Certes these Southrons lack mu^h the habits of the wood an wilderness, — for here is a man of taste and genius, a fine scholar  and a most interesting companion, haunted with fears that would be entertained by no shopkeeper from the Lucken- booths or the Saut Market.
